name: freshrss
description: FreshRSS is a self-hosted RSS feed aggregator for individuals or small teams. It supports multiple accounts, tags, filtering, and mobile-friendly UI with plugins and API integration for external apps.
features: RSS Aggregator: Multi-user feed reader, Tags and filtering, Mobile-friendly UI. Comprehensive feed management.
Multiple Accounts: Support teams or families. Shared hosting.
Plugin System: Extend functionality. Customizable features.
API Integration: Works with mobile apps. Flexible access.
Feed Discovery: Find new sources. Easy subscription.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Navigate efficiently. Power user features.
Search: Find articles quickly. Efficient discovery.
Statistics: Track reading habits. Usage insights.
